objects.name: IOC Execution of child process outside of its normal path
objects.description: Change.exe being executed and executes a child process outside of its normal path of c:\windows\system32\ or c:\windows\syswow64\
objects.pattern: [process:command_line MATCHES '^.*process\.parent\.name: \(\*change\.exe or \*Change\.exe\) and not process\.executable: \(\(\*Windows\* or \*windows\* and \*system32\*\) or \(\*windows\* or \*Windows\* and \*syswow64\*\)\) .*$']
